name: ComputerScience
description: An introductory course covering fundamental concepts of computer science including algorithms, data structures, and programming basics.

name: Mathematics
description: A comprehensive course covering various branches of mathematics, including algebra, calculus, and geometry.

name: Biology
description: An introductory course exploring the basic concepts and principles of biology, including cell biology, genetics, and evolution.

name: Chemistry
description: A study of the composition, structure, properties, and reactions of matter, with emphasis on chemical bonding and periodic trends.

name: Physics
description: An advanced course covering classical mechanics, electromagnetism, thermodynamics, and modern physics concepts.

name: Economics
description: A study of economic theories and principles related to production, distribution, and consumption of goods and services.

name: Psychology
description: An exploration of human behavior and mental processes, including perception, cognition, emotion, and personality.

name: History
description: An overview of historical events, movements, and civilizations from ancient times to the present day.

name: Literature
description: A survey of literary works from different genres, periods, and cultures, with emphasis on analysis and interpretation.

name: Business
description: An introduction to the principles and practices of business management, finance, marketing, and entrepreneurship.
